#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
inline int scan_d()    {register int ip=getchar_unlocked(),ret=0,flag=1;for(;ip<'0'||ip>'9';ip=getchar_unlocked())if(ip=='-'){flag=-1;ip=getchar_unlocked();break;}for(;ip>='0'&&ip<='9';ip=getchar_unlocked())ret=ret*10+ip-'0';return flag*ret;}
 
int main() {
	int T,i,a[26],count;
	char str[100001];
	T=scan_d();
	while(T--)
	{   scanf("%s",str);
	    for(count=i=0;i<26;a[i++]=0);
	    for(i=0;str[i]!='\0';i++)
	    {   if(!(a[str[i]-'a']))
            {   a[str[i]-'a']++;
                count++;
            }	        
	    }
	    if(count&1)
	        printf("Counter Terrorist\n");
	     else
	        printf("Terrorist\n");
	        
	   }
	return 0;
}
